entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 February 2023
